about.details:
Incorporated in 1989, Geekay Wires Limited is engaged in manufactures and supplies of galvanized steel wires and wire products in India.

Geekay Wires is an ISO 9001: 2008 certified company who manufacturer, exporter and supplier of the superlative wires and cables, like galvanized wire, earth wire, stay wire, ACSR steel core, cable armored wire, guy strand, barbed wire, spring steel wire, patented wire, detonator wire, and spring steel wire etc and other wire products comprising barbed, hairclip, steel wool, umbrella rib, nail, stitching, patented, poultry, electrode, fan wires, etc.

They serves various clients in the government and private sectors comprising power, construction, automobile, general engineering, and domestic sectors. The company also exports its products.

contactDetails.full_address: Geekay Wires Ltd, 11-70/5, G.P. Complex, Balanagar

faqs.question: What is the Geekay Wires IPO?
faqs.answer:
Geekay Wires IPO is a SME IPO of 3332000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹33 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 9, 2017, and closes on August 14, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Geekay Wires IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Geekay Wires IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Geekay Wires IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Geekay Wires IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Geekay Wires IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Geekay Wires IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Geekay Wires IPO opens on August 9, 2017 and closes on August 14, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Geekay Wires IPO?
faqs.answer: Geekay Wires IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Geekay Wires IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Geekay Wires IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
